content.rendered:
V-Neck Sublimated Ice Hockey Jersey

Crafted from 100% polyester, our V-Neck Sublimated Ice Hockey Jerseys are designed to offer the perfect blend of durability and performance. The high-quality polyester material ensures a lightweight and breathable experience, ideal for intense ice hockey games.

Advanced Moisture-Wicking Technology

Stay dry and comfortable on the ice with our advanced moisture-wicking technology. This feature effectively manages sweat, keeping players cool and focused. The sublimated graphics are infused directly into the fabric, ensuring vibrant and long-lasting designs that won’t fade or peel over time.

Customization to Meet Your Brand’s Needs

Our jerseys offer extensive customization options, allowing for unique labeling and branding on demand. With modern dyed HD sublimation, you can choose any color or design to perfectly represent your team or brand. The overall print options guarantee a seamless look that stands out on the ice.

Exceptional Craftsmanship and Finishing

Each jersey is meticulously crafted with neat shoulder-panel work and fine stitching to ensure durability and a professional appearance. Available in sizes S to 3XL, our jerseys cater to all body types, with additional sizes available on request. A minimum order quantity (MOQ) of 40 units applies, ensuring we meet bulk order needs efficiently.

excerpt.rendered:
These jerseys are marketed to global buyers by highlighting their high-quality, customizable designs, competitive pricing.

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style :V-Neck
  • Durability : Moisture-wicking | Sublimated Graphics
  • Embellishment : Modern dyed HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Neat Shoulder-Panel Work with fine stitching
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
